projects.title: Sonar-Rock-vs-Mine-UI

projects.markdown:
# ğŸ¯ Sonar Mine vs Rock Classification System

## Project Description

A machine learning-powered web application that analyzes sonar signatures to classify underwater objects as mines or rocks. The system processes 60-dimensional sonar feature data to provide real-time classification with confidence scoring, making it valuable for maritime safety and naval operations.

## Key Features

### ğŸš€ Core Functionality
- **âš¡ Real-time classification** of sonar signatures into Mine/Rock categories
- **ğŸ“Š Confidence scoring** with probability estimates (70-100%)
- **âœ… Comprehensive input validation** with user-friendly error messages
- **ğŸ§ª Pre-loaded sample data** for demonstration and testing

### ğŸ¨ User Experience
- **ğŸŒˆ Modern, responsive React interface** with gradient styling
- **ğŸ“‹ One-click clipboard integration** for sample data
- **ğŸ”¢ Real-time feature count validation**
- **ğŸ”„ Visual feedback** with loading states and color-coded results

### ğŸ“Š Technical Capabilities
- **ğŸ”¢ Processes exactly 60 normalized numerical features** (0-1 range)
- **ğŸ“Š Handles CSV-formatted sonar data** input
- **âŒ Robust error handling** for invalid inputs
- **ğŸ“± Mobile-responsive design** with accessibility support

## Technologies Used

### Frontend Stack
- **âš›ï¸ React 18+** with modern hooks architecture
- **ğŸ¨ Tailwind CSS** for utility-first styling
- **ğŸ­ Lucide React** for customizable icons
- **ğŸ“± Responsive Design** with mobile-first approach

### Integration Ready
- **ğŸ¤– Mock prediction logic** (ready for ML API integration)
- **ğŸŒ RESTful API endpoint** structure
- **ğŸ“Š JSON data processing**
- **ğŸš€ Production deployment** configuration

## Use Cases

- **ğŸ›¡ï¸ Maritime Safety**: Detect potentially dangerous underwater mines
- **âš“ Naval Operations**: Assist in underwater object identification
- **ğŸ”¬ Research & Development**: Test and validate sonar classification algorithms
- **ğŸ“ Educational Tool**: Demonstrate machine learning classification concepts

## Project Impact

The application combines advanced signal processing concepts with an intuitive user interface, making complex sonar data analysis accessible to both technical and non-technical users. It demonstrates practical machine learning implementation in a real-world maritime safety context.

## Demo & Testing

The system includes three pre-loaded test cases:
- **ğŸª¨ Rock samples**: Low-density objects with smooth surface characteristics
- **âš ï¸ Mine samples**: High-density metallic objects with irregular surfaces
- **ğŸ§ª Validation testing**: Edge cases for input validation

## Future Enhancements

- **ğŸ“Š Batch processing** for multiple sonar signatures
- **ğŸ“ˆ Data visualization** with feature pattern charts
- **ğŸ’¾ Export functionality** for results
- **ğŸ”¬ Advanced analytics** and insights
- **âš¡ Real-time processing** capabilities

# ğŸ  Real Estate Web Application

## Project Description

A full-stack real estate platform designed to connect **ğŸ˜ï¸ clients**, **ğŸ  landlords**, and **ğŸ› ï¸ administrators** through a comprehensive property management system. The platform streamlines the real estate process by providing property browsing, listing management, real-time communication, and integrated payment processing.

## Key Features

### ğŸš€ Core Functionality
- **ğŸ” Property Management**: Complete CRUD operations for property listings
- **ğŸ’¬ Real-time Communication**: Socket.IO-powered chat between clients and landlords
- **ğŸ—ºï¸ Location Integration**: Google Maps API for property location visualization
- **ğŸ’³ Payment Processing**: M-Pesa API integration for landlord subscription payments

- **ğŸ›ï¸ Role-based Dashboards**: Secure dashboards for landlords and administrators

### ğŸ“Š Technical Capabilities

## Technologies Used

### Backend Stack
- **ğŸš€ Node.js & Express.js** server framework
- **ğŸ—„ï¸ MongoDB** with Mongoose ODM for data management
- **ğŸ” JWT & bcrypt** for authentication and password security
- **ğŸ’¬ Socket.IO** for real-time chat server
- **ğŸ’³ M-Pesa API** for payment processing (Kenya)
- **â˜ï¸ Cloudinary** for media file hosting

### Deployment & Infrastructure
- **ğŸŒ Vercel** for frontend hosting
- **ğŸ–¥ï¸ Render** for backend deployment
- **â˜ï¸ MongoDB Atlas** for cloud database
- **ğŸ”’ Secure Architecture** with protected routes and middleware

## User Roles & Permissions

### ğŸ‘¥ Clients
- **ğŸŒ Public Access**: Browse and search property listings
- **ğŸ“± Property Details**: View detailed property information with media
- **ğŸ’¬ Direct Communication**: Message landlords in real-time
- **â­ Reviews**: Leave ratings and reviews for properties

### ğŸ  Landlords
- **ğŸ›ï¸ Dashboard Access**: Secure landlord management portal
- **ğŸ“ Property Management**: Create, update, and delete listings
- **ğŸ“¸ Media Uploads**: Add images and videos to properties
- **ğŸ’¬ Client Communication**: Respond to inquiries in real-time
- **ğŸ’³ Payment Integration**: Monthly payments via M-Pesa
- **ğŸ“Š Listing Analytics**: Track property status and performance

### ğŸ› ï¸ Administrators
- **ğŸ‘‘ Full Control**: Complete system administration capabilities
- **ğŸ‘¥ User Management**: Manage all clients and landlords
- **ğŸ  Property Oversight**: Full CRUD operations on all listings
- **ğŸ’° Payment Monitoring**: Track all transactions and payments
- **ğŸ“Š Analytics Dashboard**: System-wide analytics and reporting
- **ğŸ” Content Moderation**: Review and moderate user content

## Use Cases

- **ğŸ˜ï¸ Property Discovery**: Help clients find suitable rental properties
- **ğŸ’¼ Property Management**: Assist landlords in managing their listings
- **ğŸ“ˆ Business Operations**: Streamline real estate business processes
- **ğŸŒ Market Expansion**: Scale real estate operations across regions
- **ğŸ“Š Data Analytics**: Gather insights on property market trends

## Project Impact

The application addresses key challenges in the real estate industry by providing a centralized platform that eliminates communication barriers, streamlines property management, and facilitates secure transactions. It demonstrates modern web development practices with real-world business applications.

## Real-time Features

### ğŸ’¬ Messaging System
- **ğŸ”Œ Socket.IO Integration**: Instant messaging between users
- **ğŸ“± Live Notifications**: Real-time message alerts
- **ğŸ’¾ Message Persistence**: Chat history stored in database

### ğŸ’³ Payment Workflow

- **ğŸ”” STK Push**: Direct payment prompts to user phones
- **âœ… Payment Verification**: Automatic status updates

## Future Enhancements
